div.class: inner col col12 first last ida4465a01-db03-40da-ab57-f9dee2c95f8a

li.div: Thank you for visiting our website. Our new and improved website has been designed to provide valuable information about our wonderful town and valuable resources to our residents and many visitors. Our site can be utilized to access agendas and minutes to the various committee meetings held in North Kingstown, view our Town Council meetings via live stream or via our archives, find out about our many recreational programs and facilities, access financial and budget information and utilize our online services. We also encourage you to follow us on Facebook and Twitter via the icons at the top of our page.

North Kingstown is home to many parks, playgrounds and recreational facilities. Many of these facilities have seen recent improvements and additions with more exciting improvements scheduled to take place in 2019 and 2020. North Kingstown is also home to our town beach, many smaller beaches located along the coast, a top-notch municipal golf course and numerous marinas. Our family friendly neighborhoods and unique shopping opportunities highlighted by Wickford Village’s boutique shops attracting thousands of visitors each year are only 20 minutes from Providence and Newport and an hour from Boston with easy rail access.

Quonset Point, an industrial park with over 11,000 employees, is the home of R.I.’s annual Air Show, Fast Ferry to Martha’s Vineyard and quaint beaches and marinas. And our award-winning school system is regarded as one of the best in all of Rhode Island.

This is just a small part of all North Kingstown has to offer. It is a wonderful place to live, visit and do business. Please be sure to reach out to us if we can assist you in bringing your business to North Kingstown or calling our town your home. Be sure to explore our website and follow us on Facebook and Twitter for live updates on many of our community events and news.
